column.name: pid
column.info: ID of the first particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: mpid
column.info: ID of the mother of the first particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: tid
column.info: Track ID of the first particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: mtid
column.info: Track ID of the mother of the first particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: otid
column.info: Track ID of the original track that generated the first particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: trackE
column.info: Energy of the track

column.name: totEdep
column.info: Total Energy Deposited

column.name: avgX
column.info: Average X position in global reference system

column.name: avgY
column.info: Average Y position in global reference system

column.info: Average Z position in global reference system

column.info: Average X position in local reference system

column.name: avgLz
column.info: Average Z position in local reference system

column.name: sector
column.info: sector number (1-6)

column.name: panel_id
column.info: panel id (1 2 3) for (1a 1b 2)

column.name: paddle_id
column.info: paddle id

column.name: paddle_status
column.info: status of paddle (1 to 15) 15 is the best status 1 the worst see FTOF class ftof.reconstruction.PaddleConvertor

column.name: energy_left
column.info: left energy deposited

column.name: energy_right
column.info: right energy deposited

column.name: energy_left_unc
column.info: left energy deposited uncertainty

column.name: energy_right_unc
column.info: right energy deposited uncertainty

column.name: time_left
column.info: left time

column.name: time_right
column.info: right time

column.name: time_left_unc
column.info: left time uncertainty

column.name: time_right_unc
column.info: right time uncertainty

column.name: sector
column.info: sector number (1-6)

column.name: panel_id
column.info: panel id (1 2 3) for (1a 1b 2)

column.name: paddle_id
column.info: paddle id

column.name: paddle_status
column.info: status of paddle (1 to 15) 15 is the best status 1 the worst see FTOF class ftof.reconstruction.PaddleConvertor

column.name: energy
column.info: hit energy deposited

column.name: energy_unc
column.info: uncertainty hit energy deposited

column.name: time
column.info: hit time

column.name: time_unc
column.info: uncertainty hit time

column.name: x
column.info: hit x position (sector coords)

column.name: y
column.info: hit y position (sector coords)

column.name: z
column.info: hit z position (sector coords)

column.name: x_unc
column.info: uncertainty hit x position (sector coords)

column.name: y_unc
column.info: uncertainty hit y position (sector coords)

column.name: z_unc
column.info: uncertainty hit z position (sector coords)

column.name: sector
column.info: sector number (1-6)

column.name: panel_id
column.info: panel id (1 2 3) for (1a 1b 2)

column.name: paddle_id
column.info: paddle id of hit with lowest paddle id in cluster

column.name: paddle_status
column.info: status of paddle (1-15 for single hit cluster up to 0101010101-1515151515 for five hit cluster 15 is best status 1 worst see ftof.reconstruction.PaddleConvertor

column.name: energy
column.info: cluster energy deposited (sum of hit energies)

column.name: energy_unc
column.info: uncertainty cluster energy deposited

column.name: time
column.info: cluster time (which is either an energy-weighted average of hits times or the time of the earliest hit in the cluster depending on configuration of ftof software)

column.name: time_unc
column.info: uncertainty cluster time

column.name: x
column.info: cluster x position (sector coords this is either a simple average of hit x positions or the x position of the earliest hit in the cluster depending on configuration of ftof software)

column.name: y
column.info: cluster y position (sector coords this is either an energy weighted average of hit y positions or the y position of the earliest hit in the cluster depending on configuration of ftof software)

column.name: z
column.info: cluster z position (sector coords this is either a simple average of hit z positions or the z position of the earliest hit in the cluster depending on configuration of ftof software)

column.name: x_unc
column.info: uncertainty cluster x position (sector coords)

column.name: y_unc
column.info: uncertainty cluster y position (sector coords)

column.name: z_unc
column.info: uncertainty cluster z position (sector coords)
